definitions.definition: A fragment of something; a particle ; a piece ; also, a very small amount .
examples: There isn’t a shred of evidence to support his claims.

definitions.definition: A long , narrow piece (especially of fabric ) cut or torn off ; a strip ; specifically, a piece of cloth or clothing .

subdefinitions.definition: A thin strand or wisp , as of a cloud , mist , etc.
A thin strip of fruit peel , a vegetable , etc., cut so that it curls .

definitions.definition: A piece of gold or silver lace or thread .
A shard or sherd ( “ a piece of broken glass or pottery ” ) .

main_definition: A fragment of something; a particle ; a piece ; also, a very small amount .
secondary_definitions: A long , narrow piece (especially of fabric ) cut or torn off ; a strip ; specifically, a piece of cloth or clothing .
( archaic ) A piece of gold or silver lace or thread .
( rare ) A shard or sherd ( “ a piece of broken glass or pottery ” ) .
